synopsis.text: Tokyo University of the Arts' Graduate School of Film and New Media presents a captivating blend of documentary and fantasy in this 2017 animation. Nestled in the heart of Kurama, Kyoto, lies the Yuki-jinja Shrine, renowned for its annual fire festival. This film beautifully illustrates the harmonious collaboration of people, deities, and spirits in orchestrating this unique spectacle. Immerse yourself in a visual journey that celebrates tradition, spirituality, and the enchanting world of Japanese folklore.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
